      • store

        public void store()
           throws InvalidRepoUrlException,
                  InvalidRepoLabelException,
                  InvalidCertificateException
        Check for errors and store Org to db.
        Throws:
        InvalidRepoUrlException - in case repo wih given url already exists in the org
        InvalidRepoLabelException - in case repo witch given label already exists in the org
        InvalidCertificateException - in case client key is set, but client certificate is missing
